evidence.text:
ANU: I’ll send U somthng to cheer U up :p
ANU: oh wondrous rain clouds...don’t thunder too loudly... my lover is sleeping ...
ANU: Clouds with your naughty ways, are only causing a flutter in my heart. My lover is far away and maybe you can carry this message to him.
SHIAZ: I am thinking of U...wen do I C U

SHIAZ: You are very hard to please!
ANU: I feel your heartbeat.
SHIAZ: It is beating very fast...
ANU: Can you feel mine?

SHIAZ: I wish I cd sit w U.
ANU: me 2

SHIAZ: Kiss me again...
ANU: Ok save some for later!

SHIAZ: I used to ask myself many times... if I was doing the right thing being with you....or it would have been best to stay apart.
SHIAZ: But then ...when I am with you… I don't know what it is… I feel not afraid at all.. As if this Is the most natural way for us to be.
